title: playanimation
description: Makes one or more entities play a one-off animation.

fields.title: entity
fields.description: Required. A `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the entity.

fields.title: animation
fields.description: Required. A `string` that is a single word or quoted `string`  that refers to an animation name or an animation JSON file in a resource pack.

fields.title: controller
fields.description: Optional. A `string` that is an animation controller name or a new file defined in a resource pack.

overloads.title: Play animation
overloads.description: Play an animation with an entity and animation chosen, and optional next state, blend out time, stop expression, and controller.
